Earn the Modern Trade Banner by joining the Civilization Official Discord![n]See below for the steps to redeem:[n][b]Step 1[/b]: Join the Official Civilization Discord.[n][b]Step 2[/b]: Follow the instructions in the channel #earn-discord-banner.[n][b]Step 3[/b]: In-game, navigate to the Collection screen and select the code redemption button. Enter your unique code in-game to unlock.
